Processing¶

class src.processing.opinion.OpinionProcessing(serie_path, output_path, crtc_name)¶

Bases: object

This class spawns process. Each of them computes the opinion of e-prints.

Parameters

  • e_prints_path (pandas.Series) – pandas.Series of path to e-prints, indexed by their dates.

  • output_path (str) – Path to save the calculated opinion.

  • crtc_name (str) – name of the current CRTC, used to name the result folder.

crtc_name¶

Name of the CRTC

errors¶

Detected errors

nb_paths¶

Size of the self.serie_path

opinion_list¶

Used for the construction the final .csv

output_path¶

Destination folder for computed articles

process_result_pool(result) → None¶

Stocks the result into a .csv file.

Parameters

result (dict) – opinion and index of the e-print to be saved.

processing(process_number: int)¶

Creates all process and wait to their returns.

Parameters

process_number (int) – number max of ongoing processes.

serie_path¶

pandas.Series of all articles path

src.processing.opinion.process_opinion(index_path)¶

Processes an e-print.

Parameters

index_path – contain the pandas.DataFrame index and the path to this e-print.

1-Technology assessment and cyber-defence procurement
